name: unattractively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is unpleasant to look at: Most of the catwalk models were unattractively, freakishly thin. When the burger arrived, it was rather unattractively soaking in its juices.
in a way that lacks good or positive features that make someone want to do something: They charge consumers an unattractively high price for their product. unattractively low interest rates See
unattractive
More examplesFewer examplesHer mother gaped unattractively, turning a blotchy red to match her gown.Stephen's hand lay limp in hers, icy cold and unattractively damp.At first glance, the landscape seems unattractively bare.
